class.name: TetraMaterial4D
class.description: TetraMaterial4D is a material for 4D tetrahedral meshes. It provides a user-friendly way to color tetrahedral meshes using single colors, per-vertex colors, per-cell colors, per-cell UVW coordinates, or 4D texture colors. TetraMaterial4D can be set on a [TetraMesh4D] resource to define how the tetrahedral mesh should be colored, and/or overridden on a specific [MeshInstance4D] node.

members.member: The single albedo color of the material. When the albedo source is set to [constant TETRA_COLOR_SOURCE_SINGLE_COLOR], this is the color of the entire tetrahedral mesh. If the albedo source is set to [constant TETRA_COLOR_SOURCE_PER_VERT_AND_SINGLE], [constant TETRA_COLOR_SOURCE_PER_CELL_AND_SINGLE], [constant TETRA_COLOR_SOURCE_CELL_UVW_AND_SINGLE], or [constant TETRA_COLOR_SOURCE_TEXTURE4D_AND_SINGLE], this color is multiplied with the per-vertex, per-cell, per-cell UVW, or 4D texture colors, respectively.

The albedo color array of the material. This may be used to color various parts of the mesh, depending on the albedo source flags. Only used when any of the per-item color flags are set, meaning the [constant TETRA_COLOR_SOURCE_PER_VERT_ONLY], [constant TETRA_COLOR_SOURCE_PER_CELL_ONLY], [constant TETRA_COLOR_SOURCE_PER_VERT_AND_SINGLE], and [constant TETRA_COLOR_SOURCE_PER_CELL_AND_SINGLE] tetra color sources.

The albedo source of the material, an enum specific to tetrahedral meshes. Can be a single color, per-vertex, per-cell, per-cell UVW coordinates, 4D texture, or a combination of single color and the other color sources.

The albedo texture of the material as a Texture3D. Used by the cross-section renderer. Used when albedo_source is [constant TETRA_COLOR_SOURCE_CELL_UVW_ONLY] or [constant TETRA_COLOR_SOURCE_CELL_UVW_AND_SINGLE].

constants.constant: Indicates the color source is a single color for the entire tetrahedral mesh.
Indicates the color source is the color array where each item is used for a vertex.
Indicates the color source is the color array where each item is used for a cell.
Indicates the color source is a 3D texture which cells read based on their UVW coordinates.
Indicates the color source is a 4D texture which cells read based on their local space 4D coordinates.
Indicates the color source is the color array where each item is used for a vertex, modulated by a single color.
Indicates the color source is the color array where each item is used for a cell, modulated by a single color.
